snippet: No town has been better than Senoia, Ga., in taking advantage of the state’s tax incentives for filmmakers, and its biggest claim to fame is the hit show “The Walking Dead.”
abstract: Town of Senoia, Ga, has fared better than other rural small towns during recession due to state's tax incentives for filmmakers, which has drawn companies to area and allowed town to thrive; town is well-known for being setting of hit show The Walking Dead and many feature films.
lead_paragraph: No town has been better than Senoia, Ga., in taking advantage of the state’s tax incentives for filmmakers, and its biggest claim to fame is the hit show “The Walking Dead.”

headline.main: A Georgia Main Street Paved in Red Carpet
headline.print_headline: A Georgia Main Street Paved in Red Carpet
